verses.verse: But now they that are younger <S%H6810><s%> <S%H3117><s%> than I have me in derision <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, whose fathers <S%H1><s%> I would have disdained <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to have set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with the dogs <S%H3611><s%> of my flock <S%H6629><s%>.
Yea, whereto <S%H4100><s%> might the strength <S%H3581><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%> profit me, in whom old age <S%H3624><s%> was perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ?

For want <S%H2639><s%> and famine <S%H3720><s%> they were solitary <S%H1565><s%>; fleeing <S%H6207><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into the wilderness <S%H6723><s%> in former time <S%H570><s%> desolate <S%H7722><s%> and waste <S%H4875><s%>.
Who cut up <S%H6998><s%> <S%H8801><s%> mallows <S%H4408><s%> by the bushes <S%H7880><s%>, and juniper <S%H7574><s%> roots <S%H8328><s%> for their meat <S%H3899><s%>.
They were driven forth <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8792><s%> from among <S%H1460><s%> men, (they cried <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%> after them as after a thief <S%H1590><s%>;)
To dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the clifts <S%H6178><s%> of the valleys <S%H5158><s%>, in caves <S%H2356><s%> of the earth <S%H6083><s%>, and in the rocks <S%H3710><s%>.
Among the bushes <S%H7880><s%> they brayed <S%H5101><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; under the nettles <S%H2738><s%> they were gathered together <S%H5596><s%> <S%H8792><s%>.
They were children <S%H1121><s%> of fools <S%H5036><s%>, yea, children <S%H1121><s%> of base men <S%H8034><s%>: they were viler <S%H5217><s%> <S%H8738><s%> than the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And now am I their song <S%H5058><s%>, yea, I am their byword <S%H4405><s%>.
They abhor <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me, they flee far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from me, and spare <S%H2820><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not to spit <S%H7536><s%> in my face <S%H6440><s%>.

Because he hath loosed <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my cord <S%H3499><s%>, and afflicted <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me, they have also let loose <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the bridle <S%H7448><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

Upon my right <S%H3225><s%> hand rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the youth <S%H6526><s%>; they push away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%>, and they raise up <S%H5549><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against me the ways <S%H734><s%> of their destruction <S%H343><s%>.

They mar <S%H5420><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my path <S%H5410><s%>, they set forward <S%H3276><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my calamity <S%H1942><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H1962><s%>, they have no helper <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

They came <S%H857><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon me as a wide <S%H7342><s%> breaking <S%H6556><s%> in of waters: in <S%H8478><s%> the desolation <S%H7722><s%> they rolled <S%H1556><s%> <S%H8701><s%> themselves upon me.

Terrors <S%H1091><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8717><s%> upon me: they pursue <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my soul <S%H5082><s%> as the wind <S%H7307><s%>: and my welfare <S%H3444><s%> passeht away <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as a cloud <S%H5645><s%>.
And now my soul <S%H5315><s%> is poured out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8691><s%> upon me; the days <S%H3117><s%> of affliction <S%H6040><s%> have taken hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon me.
My bones <S%H6106><s%> are pierced <S%H5365><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in me in the night season <S%H3915><s%>: and my sinews <S%H6207><s%> <S%H8802><s%> take no rest <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

By the great <S%H7230><s%> force <S%H3581><s%> of my disease is my garment <S%H3830><s%> changed <S%H2664><s%> <S%H8691><s%>: it bindeth me about <S%H247><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as the collar <S%H6310><s%> of my coat <S%H3801><s%>.
He hath cast <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me into the mire <S%H2563><s%>, and I am become like <S%H4911><s%> <S%H8691><s%> dust <S%H6083><s%> and ashes <S%H665><s%>.
I cry <S%H7768><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee, and thou dost not hear <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me: I stand up <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thou regardest <S%H995><s%> <S%H8709><s%> me not.
Thou art become <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8735><s%> cruel <S%H393><s%> to me: with thy strong <S%H6108><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> thou opposest <S%H7852><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thyself against me.

Thou liftest me up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the wind <S%H7307><s%>; thou causest me to ride <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon it, and dissolvest <S%H4127><s%> <S%H8787><s%> my substance <S%H8454><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7738><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
For I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou wilt bring <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me to death <S%H4194><s%>, and to the house <S%H1004><s%> appointed <S%H4150><s%> for all living <S%H2416><s%>.
Howbeit he will not stretch out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to the grave <S%H1164><s%>, though they cry <S%H7769><s%> in his destruction <S%H6365><s%>.
Did not I weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for him that was in trouble <S%H7186><s%> <S%H3117><s%>? was not my soul <S%H5315><s%> grieved <S%H5701><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for the poor <S%H34><s%> ?

When I looked <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, then evil <S%H7451><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me: and when I waited <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for light <S%H216><s%>, there came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> darkness <S%H652><s%>.
My bowels <S%H4578><s%> boiled <S%H7570><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, and rested <S%H1826><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not: the days <S%H3117><s%> of affliction <S%H6040><s%> prevented <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.

I went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8765><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> <S%H8802><s%> without the sun <S%H2535><s%>: I stood up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and I cried <S%H7768><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the congregation <S%H6951><s%>.
I am a brother <S%H251><s%> to dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and a companion <S%H7453><s%> to owls <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%>.
My skin <S%H5785><s%> is black <S%H7835><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me, and my bones <S%H6106><s%> are burned <S%H2787><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with heat <S%H2721><s%>.
My harp <S%H3658><s%> also is turned to mourning <S%H60><s%>, and my organ <S%H5748><s%> into the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
